SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.ear.reservation_system.service

Class OrderService

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.ear.reservation_system.service.OrderService
All Implemented Interfaces:
CRUDOperations<Order>
@Service public class OrderService extends Object implements CRUDOperations<Order>
Service class for managing orders. This class provides CRUD operations for orders.
